column5: On this master's programme, you'll explore essential global management concepts, positioning you for success in diverse sectors and specialisms worldwide.Experience innovative, activity-based learning, featuring an off-campus team-building weekend and immersive business simulations. Your educational journey will be shaped by the latest findings from globally renowned researchers, delivered by recognised leaders in decision-making and operations management.The course allows you a wide selection of topics, ensuring flexibility in your career prospects. Innovative modules like Career Management in the Digital Age will guide your transition into the professional world. Upon graduation, step confidently into global management roles across various sectors.
